force:auth:username:login.description: This command adds a simple login mechanism missing from sfdx.
examples:
$ sfdx force:auth:username:login --username=lodoss118@saasforceltd.com 
                                          --password=xxxxxxxxxx
 
        Logged in as: lodoss118@saasforceltd.com (xxxxxxxxxxx)
        Organization: SAASFORCE LTD (xxxxxxxxxxx)

loglevel.name: loglevel
loglevel.description: logging level for this command invocation
